stack of books:
Since the war began ticking time period, called catastrophic. The Giants led by Kamael defied the gods. She angered Einhasad. Goddess lifted Star Hammer and destroyed empire of Granperion and the island of giants. Several fortresses around Granperiona still tried to resist, but the loss of the ruling elite took away their hope for victory. Most castles were conquered and destroyed. Cave of the Giants was the last large-scale resisting strength.
